data.message: hey eminem, i need your help. ive got this best friend thats basically been through the exact stuff as you have. the only people he has to make him happy is me, and you. a few days ago, he sent me this text message, and his only family member was sent to an insanasilem, and he was sent somewhere else. since he listens to your music and is a stan, and basically worships you, im asking you to tell him goodbye for me. my name is travis, and my friends name is gabe, or lilg. ps- you inspired us both to start rapping, so we do raps together.

replies.message: say goodbye to him? what does that mean?? i will pass the msg to him !! we speak everyday :)
Lul he's not gone I found out
